scenario_text.value:
(Everyone’s here, but the vibe still feels
a little different than it used to.)

(After what happened, everyone’s trust in
these monsters has gone down the drain.)
Hey, guys! Glad to see you’re all here.

(This isn’t good. Everyone here looks like
they’re really on edge.)

Takuma, is it just me or do things feel tense
around here?
Yeah, you can say that again.
Huh? Crap! Enemies are coming to attack us!
